nodes.bodyText:
The content in this tagged region gets re-used here:
https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/modules-cross-cluster-search.html#ccs-works
Originally, that was intended to explain the concept of gateway nodes before the recommendations outlined here:
https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/modules-cross-cluster-search.html#ccs-gateway-seed-nodes
With these changes, I don't think this re-use makes sense anymore. I'm also not sure if those recommendations would work with proxy mode.
Could you advise on how these changes would impact those CCS recommendations? After that, you can either update those docs as a part of this PR or I can update them as part of a separate PR. Thanks!
